intro: Orestias elegans, commonly known as the elegant orestia, is a species of aquatic plant found in high-altitude lakes in the Andes. It belongs to the family Cyperaceae, which includes sedges and related plants. The plant is characterized by its slender, grass-like stems and small, scale-like leaves. It thrives in cold, oligotrophic waters and is adapted to the extreme environmental conditions of its habitat. Orestias elegans plays an important role in the ecological balance of these unique ecosystems.
